TopicTitle: i am trying to find a mod but have no luck so far

Articles.Content: i am trying to look for this mod i saw a few times that involves adding controls for eva that allows me to set up patrol routes and control multiple Kerbonauts at once so can some one inform me if they know what it is called or have the link to it please
This is it I think but it needs someone to update it.

crap now i need to find 2 other mods for my space planes....

one involves an alarm that goes off before you hit the ground and the other signals whether or not your in line to land on the runway

Edit: really after these two i will probably stop using this thread to find mods although it is free for other people to do the same and look for mods via this thread

Edit Edit: i found second mod which is PAPI array but the other i haven't

Edited August 18, 2013 by Helix935

Are these the things you're looking for?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/43134-0-21-GPWS-for-Jets-Planes-v1-1-UPDATED-MORE-SOUNDS
